title: Apple releases watchOS 8.5 beta 4 as RC version approaches [U]
content:
Update: watchOS 8.5 beta 4 now available to public beta testers as well.

Apple is releasing watchOS 8.5 beta 4 to all developers. This version comes one week after the previous beta, and 12 days after the company made available watchOS 8.4.2 to all users.

more…

The post Apple releases watchOS 8.5 beta 4 as RC version approaches [U] appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple is releasing watchOS 8.5 beta 4 to all developers. This version comes one week after the previous beta.
